title: A City in the North: reconsidered
description: Marta Randall’s A City in the North is a work of anthropological SF that focuses on “authentic” relationships between its human and alien characters. A commentary on the societal effects and cultural disconnects between natives, explorers, and colonizers, A City in the North refuses to provide easy answers ... Randall’s novel intrigues and provokes.
author: Marta Randall
